message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130.  It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $130 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $110 is just a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $115.  Let's meet in the middle!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $115 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $108. I'm willing to pay a bit more than I initially offered, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
